### Ingest
Ingest a pdf for all pages 

```{r load-data, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-hide'}


url_root <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UN-AVT/kamino-source/main/sources/0-shared/data/"
url_file <- "ecological-threat-register/ecological-threat-register-2020.pdf"
url <- paste0(url_root, url_file)

pdf_file <- url

# Extract the text for all pages
report_text <- pdf_text(pdf_file) %>% strsplit(split = "\r\n")

temp_report <- as.data.frame(report_text[])

temp_report


```


now for page three 

```{r , echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-hide'}

#Extract for page 3

temp_report2 <- as.data.frame(report_text[[3]])

temp_report2


```
